column4: hi....i am using remote sharing ....how do I copy & paste files ?
I didnt see your question...would you mind repeating it ?
ah darn... I am not the right person for those questions .... also if no one here has an answer at the moment, you could try  ##linux channel
did you try  sudo apt-get install fail2ban... not sure installation was your issue
my fail2ban is up & running....all my issue is.....ssh does not log log-ins in auth.log

ah ok... well... I cant help with that specific issue because I dont have use that  but if no one here can help at this time you could try ##linux  channel ...they may have a broader base of info for this
yeah since fail2 is not a specific  issue  I bet ##linux channel would be able to help :)
just register your nick and you should be able to join that channel
you can register   by typing  /msg nickserv register --help
make sure you have the notification area on the panel first
